Jagris stopped moonwalking long enough to realize that even if she 
couldn't find Hot Rod, his com frequency would alert him.
"Computer, access Hot Rod's secondary frequency and send him my 
distress message."
"Unit Hot Rod is out of range." 
"I don't care. Bounce the signal. This planet does have satellites, 
y'know."
"Message is being sent. Stand by."
"Thanks."
Jagris turned up her head phones and went back into her little zone.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, jagris@m... wrote:
> OOC: I figured as much... oh well, 
> 
> IC: Jagris tags along, downtrodden that she doesn't get to see Hot 
> Rod, luckily for her, wars often went on forever. Turning on her 
> onboard speakers, she started listening to techno and zoned out of 
> the situation.
